channel.title: Goal Achievement on Mianshi Handbook
channel.description: Recent content in Goal Achievement on Mianshi Handbook

item.title: Work With People From Different Sections
item.description: Q: Recall an occasion when you had to work with people from different divisions to accomplish a single goal. Situation and Tasks: year 2015, our lab at Whiteshell was an accredited lab. There is lab quality management system. I was the author of our quality manual. The coorperate quality officer requested to revise the quality manual for aligning with cooperate quality manual, so our quality manual became a component of quality system.
